name: places/ChIJow-9Gxz3wokRcZdx0HWSWSo
formattedAddress: 1204 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1204 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I started going here only because Jyoti is here. She has been doing my eyebrows since 2018 and it's been a love affair ever since. I have followed her wherever she goes and have recommended her to family and friends. Her sister Avi is great as well! Both sisters are amazing and sweet! Love getting my eyebrows and wax with them

text.text: I started going here only because Jyoti is here. She has been doing my eyebrows since 2018 and it's been a love affair ever since. I have followed her wherever she goes and have recommended her to family and friends. Her sister Avi is great as well! Both sisters are amazing and sweet! Love getting my eyebrows and wax with them

originalText.text: Jyoti has been threading my eyebrows for 12 years now and she never disappoints! I ran in this afternoon and as usual I got the perfect shape and I feel brand new! I am very demanding when it comes to my thick brows and Jyoti always asks what my desired results are and walks me through her process. I will continue to be a loyal client!

I am very demanding when it comes to my thick brows and Jyoti always asks what my desired results are and walks me through her process. I will continue to be a loyal client!

originalText.text: Great place . I love it here and especially getting waxed by joti and her sister as well. Everyone is always so kind and professional and patient. I highly recommend.

text.text: Great place . I love it here and especially getting waxed by joti and her sister as well. Everyone is always so kind and professional and patient. I highly recommend.

originalText.text: It's the rolling of the eyes when someone comes in, pushing services you don't want and claiming no one knows how to do acrylics when their website offers the service because "gel nails lool bettwr". Five women lounging in chairs doing each others nails and asking you to wait until they're done before servicing their clients. Bagas lo que son.

text.text: It's the rolling of the eyes when someone comes in, pushing services you don't want and claiming no one knows how to do acrylics when their website offers the service because "gel nails lool bettwr". Five women lounging in chairs doing each others nails and asking you to wait until they're done before servicing their clients. Bagas lo que son.

originalText.text: This place survives off another business because it isn’t nails. I went here about the same time most of these reviews were written, 8 months or so ago. It was good back then. I’m not sure what had happened since because it looks as if they have other interests. I just did my nails Tuesday. I went in looking for a service they promoted on Instagram, but the nails techs had no idea what I was talking about. So I settled on an SNS but only one of them new how to do that. Then I was tended to while the one tech worked on another lady and she did it fast because otherwise I would be waiting longer and I was in a schedule. That was fine but today my nails are chipping they actually stated chipping yesterday after one day. I tried calling all the numbers they have and there is no answer. I will have to take time out of my day to go in person to see if they fix it. I honestly would rather go to a different spot that knows how to do nails. This place might look decent on the outside, but it’s lacking the services it says it offers. Maybe they only really should focus on hair and eyebrows. I would go elsewhere for nails and spa treatments. They seems to have a revolving door for nail techs and estheticians.
